title: me, an akali main when i see people begging for nerfs

replies.body: Look I am not asking for Akali nerfs, I am asking to get rid of the one ability that has been toxic in her kit since she was introduced to the game. The shroud, and give her something else that thing is so tilting.
New Akali, by her very own kit and super-duper true stealth will always be a hot topic, I suggest you get used to that!
